page.title: 13CLUBS
page.content: My favourite subject is athletics. I belong to Cleethorpes Athletics Club but I can't remember how long I have been going there. In all the clubs there are different age groups and boys and girls don't run together. The lowest groups are the minor boys and the minor girls. When you get older the boys go into the "Colts" and the girls to the "Girls". I'm in the minor group but I train with the "Girls" because most of the minors are 5, 6, 7 or 8 and I am lO. We start training just after six o'clock and we finish at about quarter past seven. We train every Tuesday and Thursday. After we have done our training we can buy a drink. Cups of orange are 5p, coffee and tea are 5p and lOp. In the Summer we race against other clubs on a track but in Winter we do cross-country. I have won medals track racing.
